title: Asymmetric Resource Consumption (Amplification)
overview: This situation is amplified if the software allows malicious users or attackers to consume more resources than their access level permits. Exploiting such a weakness can lead to asymmetric resource consumption, aiding in amplification attacks against the system or the network.
remediation: ::PHASE:Architecture and Design:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:An application must make resources available to a client commensurate with the client&#x27;s access level.::PHASE:Architecture and Design:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:An application must, at all times, keep track of allocated resources and meter their usage appropriately.::
